body: I've come to accept that NTR is a genre whose main attraction is its art instead of its plot, as well as embracing the fact that its narrative is quality-declining; it was obvious that the focus of NTR was that of making the reader feel like shit or to feel like a twisted sociopath, yet all it has become is a bland, oftentimes boring story that caters to a certain audience trying to satisfy them and entering that specific market for the sake of selling well. I have accepted that NTR is becoming a simple art-showcase focused and sold to a market that pays well. At least that's the reason I think many artists draw NTR. Alas, fap to the art, plot to the trash.
